reviews.text: Subject: Update on CAD Round-Up Feature and Beta Opt-In Opportunity
reviews.reason_text: Subject line indicates context but not a requirement.

reviews.text:
Hi Karen,

Thanks so much for your patience regarding the rollout of our CAD round-up feature—I apologize for the unexpected delay.
reviews.reason_text: Thank you note is context without requirements.

reviews.text: Your feedback has been invaluable, and we sincerely appreciate your understanding as we work diligently to get everything right.
reviews.reason_text: Appreciation and thanks are communication, not requirements.

reviews.text: I'm happy to share that we’re firmly committed to enabling CAD round-up accounts by 1 July 2025.
reviews.reason_text: Commitment statement is context without enforceable behavior.

reviews.text: To ensure a smooth transition, we’ll be offering early beta access starting next week, and we’d love to have you participate.
reviews.reason_text: Obligation to enable CAD accounts by a date.

reviews.text: You’ll receive a follow-up email with detailed instructions on how to opt in.
reviews.reason_text: Beta access offer is context without requirements.

reviews.text: Migrating your existing funds will be straightforward—simply confirm the transfer within your account dashboard when prompted, and your current savings will automatically carry over to the new CAD account.
reviews.reason_text: Follow-up email instructions are procedural examples.

reviews.text: If you have any further questions or need assistance during this process, feel free to reach out.
reviews.reason_text: Support line is context without enforceable behavior.

reviews.text:
Warm regards,  
The SaveRound Team  
support@saveround.io
reviews.reason_text: Contact information only provides contact details.
